full_text:
John Benjamin Toshack OBE  is a Welsh former footballer and football manager. He is currently manager of Wydad Casablanca. He has also managed several others clubs including Swansea City, who he took from the Fourth Division to the First in four seasons, and two spells with Real Madrid.
As a player, he is remembered for being part of the Liverpool side of the 1970s, where he formed a forward partnership with Kevin Keegan.
^ Toshack left Swansea in October 1983, only to return in December.
